bilingual.source: Then one day, I had to go through a two-hour medical treatment.
bilingual.target: 然后有一天，我不得不接受两个小时的治疗。

bilingual.source: The musician bravely went through a one-year medical treatment for the serious disease.
bilingual.target: 这位音乐家勇敢地接受了一年的严重疾病治疗。

bilingual.source: Worked as the leader of a research team aiming to discover a treatment for malaria.
bilingual.target: 担任研究团队的负责人，旨在发现治疗疟疾的方法。

bilingual.source: Treatment for stenosis often includes physical therapy and medication.
bilingual.target: 狭窄的治疗通常包括物理治疗和药物治疗。

bilingual.source: The treater explained the treatment plan to the patient.
bilingual.target: 治疗者向病人解释了治疗计划。

bilingual.source: Physical therapy is a common treatment for spondylosis.
bilingual.target: 物理治疗是脊椎病的常见治疗方法。

bilingual.source: Treatment for paraphilia often involves therapy and medication.
bilingual.target: 性欲倒错的治疗通常包括治疗和药物。

list.abstract: treatment（[ˈtriːtmənt]），英语单词。词性是名词，释义为对待；待遇；美容护理。例句：After years of regular treatment, she became healthy.（经过多年的定期治疗，她恢复了健康）。 近义词为therapy、transactions、settlement。

yingyinNormal.en: I sent you to treatment to deal with your problems. Clearly, more treatment is required. No!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我安排你去治疗改掉你的长久以来的坏毛病，看来还得再给你加一些。不！

yingyinNormal.en: And that's exactly the feeling we want to address with this course of treatment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今日的治疗针对的正是这种感觉。

yingyinNormal.en: So, I came down here to spend time with her while she undergoes further treatment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，我来这儿陪她进行进一步的治疗。

yingyinNormal.en: How did you lose them? The treatment for my spine effects my DNA.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么没有了技能？治疗我脊柱的血清修正了我的DNA。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you really believe is the best course of treatment? It's not that simple.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得最佳的治疗方法是什么？这没那么简单。

yingyinNormal.en: The question is which system is more likely to deliver modern treatment to the local population?
yingyinNormal.zh: 关键问题是哪个体系更可能给当地民众提供先进的治疗？

yingyinNormal.en: But the gene that regulates that down is broken. And so this informs, among other things, of course, a treatment for bone marrow transplant, which he undertakes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这个基因的此种功能出现问题，所以对于这个问题他接受了骨髓移植的治疗。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not alone. Never have been. Christopher's become so smart. If I don't continue my treatment, then they'll take him away from me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不是一个人，从未。克里斯托夫变得更聪明了，如果我不继续我的治疗，他们会，呃，他们会从我身边夺走他。

yingyinNormal.en: If these were theater performers in sort of athletes, would you seek special treatment?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他们俩是舞台剧演员，你也会要求特殊待遇吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And I felt that the better approach would be to have a lower intensity and longer treatment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为最佳的处理方式是较低强度和较长时间。

yingyinNormal.en: You always got special treatment. Because I'm black? No, because you're black and you're adopted.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你总能获得特别待遇。因为我是黑人吗？不，因为你是黑人，而且是养子。

yingyinNormal.en: He's done this with me, my dear. Now you'll be paraded past every element of treatment: surgical, palliative, you name it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他对我也来过这套，他会逐项跟你炫耀医院的设施，手术，疗养，随你说。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't have to be an arse! Your friends got the shitty treatment. Fine. They deserved it. I'm just trying to do my job as best I can.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不用非得这么混蛋，你的朋友们受到这样的对待是他们活该。我只是在尽力做好我的工作而已。

yingyinNormal.en: No, and, of course, I would never suggest special treatment for Lily even if she is a former orphan and minority and daughter of two gay men.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然了，我肯定不会为莉莉要求特殊对待，尽管她曾是孤儿，又是外国移民，还是两个同志的女儿。

yingyinNormal.en: Sit down! You two strike me as a couple of girls who are used to special treatment. I don't know who your last teacher was, but I don't do that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给我坐下！你们两个给我的印象就是你们已经习惯了得到特殊对待。我不知道你们上一任老师是谁，但我不会那样的。

yingyinNormal.en: It's the patient that he'd better to have a lower intensity and longer treatment, because we don't incorporate duration as well into our destinations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实病人更偏向于低强度疼痛感较长时间的处理方式，因为我们不会把持续时间计入最终感受的疼痛里。

yingyinNormal.en: However, this treatment remains fairly controversial as studies on rats and monkeys have shown that even small amounts of MDMA can not only destroy the endings of brain cells involved in the release of serotonin but potentially cause permanent brain damage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，这种疗法现在还很有争议，因为对老鼠和猴子进行药物测试发现，摇头丸不只会破坏那些制造复合胺的脑细胞，还极有可能造成大脑永久损坏。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 对待；待遇；美容护理；保健护理；治疗；处理；表现；讨论；疗程；医治

word_family.mean: v. 对待；款待某人；商谈；谈判；处理；看待；视为；医疗；医治；陈述

sense_info_list.en: medical care given to a patient for an illness or injury

examination_example.sentence: Surely there must be some middle ground that balances zoos <highlight>treatment</highlight> of animals with their educational potential.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，必须要有一些中间立场来平衡动物园对待动物的方式和它们的教育潜力。

examination_example.sentence: A distressed animal in a zoo will get as good or better <highlight>treatment</highlight> than most of us at our local hospital.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 动物园里一只悲伤的动物会在我们当地的医院得到和我们大多数人一样好甚至更好的治疗。

examination_example.sentence: It is hoped that future studies could explain these differences and perhaps lead to different <highlight>treatments</highlight> for men and women.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 希望未来的研究能解释这些差异，也许能带来针对男女不同的治疗。

sense_info_list.en: a way of behaving towards or dealing with a person or thing

examination_example.sentence: If connections can be bought, a basic premise of democratic society — that all are equal in <highlight>treatment</highlight> by government — is undermined.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果人脉是可以贿赂收买的，那么民主社会的一个基本前提——政府对所有人一视同仁——就会遭到破坏。

sense_info_list.en: the manner in which someone behaves toward or deals with someone or something

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 未治疗的；未处理的；未改进的；未改变的
n. 对待；待遇；美容护理；保健护理；治疗；处理；表现；讨论；疗程；医治

word_family.mean: v. 对待；款待某人；商谈；谈判；处理；看待；视为；医疗；医治；陈述

sense_info_list.en: a way of behaving towards or dealing with a person or thing

examination_example.sentence: I'm talking about those who consistently believe they deserve special <highlight>treatment</highlight> and generous rewards.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我说的是那些始终认为自己应该得到特殊待遇和丰厚奖励的人。
他们受到了不公平的待遇。

examination_example.sentence: This thereby leads them to expect the same kind of spoilt <highlight>treatment</highlight> throughout their adult lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，这导致他们在成年后的生活中期待同样被宠坏的待遇。

sense_info_list.en: medical care given to a patient for an illness or injury

examination_example.sentence: It's important to note that robotic nurses don't decide courses of <highlight>treatment</highlight> or make diagnoses (though robot doctors and surgeons may not be far off).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 需要注意的是，机器人护士并不能决定治疗方案或做出诊断（虽然机器人医生和外科医生可能离我们不远了）。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 对待；待遇；美容护理；保健护理；治疗；处理；表现；讨论；疗程；医治
adj. 能治疗的；好对付的；能处理的

word_family.mean: v. 对待；款待某人；商谈；谈判；处理；看待；视为；医疗；医治；陈述

sense_info_list.en: medical care given to a patient for an illness or injury

examination_example.sentence: It will benefit healthcare providers and the pharmaceutical (制药的) industry when health insurance and clinical guidelines promote <highlight>treatment</highlight> with drugs and surgery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它将有利于医疗服务提供者和制药行业当健康保险和临床指导方针促进药物和手术治疗。

examination_example.sentence: The World Health Organization reports that depression has the greatest burden of disease worldwide, in terms of the total cost of <highlight>treatment</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界卫生组织报告称，就治疗的总成本而言，抑郁症是全世界最大的疾病负担。

examination_example.sentence: A study of the University found that patients got tests and <highlight>treatments</highlight> faster if they were cared for by iPad-equipped residents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一所大学的一项研究发现，如果患者由配备iPad的居民护理，他们可以更快地获得测试和治疗。

sense_info_list.en: the manner in which someone behaves toward or deals with someone or something
the use of a chemical; physical; or biological agent to preserve or give particular properties to something

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 对待；待遇；美容护理；保健护理；治疗；处理；表现；讨论；疗程；医治

word_family.mean: v. 对待；款待某人；商谈；谈判；处理；看待；视为；医疗；医治；陈述

sense_info_list.en: medical care given to a patient for an illness or injury

examination_example.sentence: After years of regular <highlight>treatment</highlight>, she became healthy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经过多年的定期治疗，她恢复了健康。

sense_info_list.en: the manner in which someone behaves toward or deals with someone or something

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 对待；待遇；美容护理；保健护理；治疗；处理；表现；讨论；疗程；医治

word_family.mean: v. 对待；款待某人；商谈；谈判；处理；看待；视为；医疗；医治；陈述

examination_example.sentence: Once, she got badly ill but had no money for the <highlight>treatment</highlight> (治疗).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一次，她病得很重，但没有钱治疗。

examination_example.sentence: In the <highlight>treatment</highlight> of some of the most serious illnesses, having proper medicine is important.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在治疗一些最严重的疾病时，适当的药物是很重要的。

examination_example.sentence: People with health problems go online to look for the new <highlight>treatment</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有健康问题的人上网寻找新的治疗方法。

examination_example.sentence: How many wild animals are facing bad <highlight>treatment</highlight> according to WAP?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据WAP，有多少野生动物面临着恶劣的待遇?
